name: Medichess
description:
Medichess is an arcade game about collecting as much as gold you can. It is simple, get gold and don't die with the skeletons who are attacking the village. There are future plans to add a shop where you will spend the gold to get new characters and maps.

Feedback is requiered to improve the game, thanks community! ^^

The game is only in English and it is easy to understand.

Credits: Jesús García Sastre (@jegarsas)

Imag
